==Future Star Rising==
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Observe the marked location)
:'''Paimon:''' Let Paimon see. It says "Observe the changes in your environment carefully"... Is that a hint that someone specifically left here for us? Well, let's have a look around then.
:'''Paimon:''' Was this wind current always here, or did it just suddenly appear? Well, let's follow it and see what happens. It might have something to {{sic}} with this "Future Star" thing...
{{Dialogue end}}

==The Perilous Road's Future Star==
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Approach the marked location)
:'''Paimon:''' Agh! Did we alert these monsters? Let's get rid of them first, then get back to looking for the Future Star.

;(Defeat the enemies)
:'''Paimon:''' Pfft, easy pickings for us! Let's examine the wind current that just appeared and have a look around on that end.
{{Dialogue end}}

==The Wise Future Star==
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Approach the marked location)
:'''Paimon:''' Huh. That's a rather familiar puzzle. Guess we'll just have to find the corresponding hints to solve it.

;(After solving the puzzle)
:'''Paimon:''' Alrighty. That's this one open. The Future Star should be nearby!
{{Dialogue end}}

==The Hidden Path's Future Star==
